Title: Author Correction: Regulatory feedback from nascent RNA to chromatin and transcription (Nature Reviews Molecular Cell Biology, (2017), 18, 5, (331-337), 10.1038/nrm.2017.12)
Abstract: © 2019, Springer Nature Limited.The original Acknowledgements section is missing funding information. The full Acknowledgements should read: ‘The authors are grateful to J. Rinn for his comments on the manuscript. L.S., M.B.-N. and R.G.J. are funded by a European Research Council (ERC) Starting Grant (ChromatinRNA, 311704).’.
